Articles.Content: This, is the LOL! It made me laugh when i first flew it, giving it the name LOL!. one word of advice, go gentel, okay? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) great! ohh, and make sure you use a small amount of rcs to push it out from the sticky unway. and use it for a big gain on aceleration. also, use arcs to pull up. ALWAYS PULL UP. okay? gooood ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Sexiest rocket. Ever. Made. End of story. :-X
Reminds me of a Tie Fighter

> 
> How does it even fly ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

belive me it does. but landing is quite hard.
